movies.title: Ammon, Missionary to the Lamanites
movies.plot: Ammon and his brothers leave the land of the Nephites to teach the Lamanites about Christ. Through faithful servitude, Ammon helps convert King Lamoni and his people
movies.simplePlot: Ammon and his brothers leave the land of the Nephites to teach the Lamanites about Christ. Through faithful servitude, Ammon helps convert King Lamoni and his people

biography.bio: Paul Nichols is an actor, known for The Joseph Smith Story (1988), The Returning (1983) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Paul Nichols

biography.bio: Patrick Page was born on April 27, 1962 in Monmouth, Oregon, USA as John Patrick Page. He is an actor, known for Sing Along (2013), Affluenza (2014) and The Substance of Fire (1996). He has been married to Paige Davis since October 27, 2001.
biography.name: Patrick Page

biography.bio: Sherry Sailer is an actress, known for Choke Canyon (1986) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Sherry Sailer

biography.bio: Gregory Snegoff was born on June 22, 1955 in Santa Monica, California, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Misery (1990), Wicked City (1987) and Glengarry Glen Ross (1992). He is married to Fiorella Capuano. He was previously married to Lisa Michelson.
biography.name: Gregory Snegoff

biography.bio: Oscar Rowland was born on March 27, 1926. He was an actor, known for Footloose (1984), Bats (1999) and Promised Land (1987). He was married to Beverly Rowland. He died on October 20, 2010 in the USA.
biography.name: Oscar Rowland

biography.bio: Seldon Young is a producer and actor, known for The Swan Princess (1994), The Swan Princess: Escape from Castle Mountain (1997) and The Swan Princess Christmas (2012).
biography.name: Seldon Young

biography.bio: Kerrigan Mahan was born on January 27, 1955 in Encino, California, USA as Kerrigan Patrick Mahan. He is an actor and director, known for Mighty Morphin Power Rangers (1993), Doctor Dolittle (1998) and V.R. Troopers (1994). He has been married to Melanie Williams-Mahan since October 29, 2003. He was previously married to Joyce Kurtz.
biography.name: Kerrigan Mahan

biography.bio: Tamara Fowler is an actress, known for Mr. Krueger's Christmas (1980), The Hideout (1977) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987). She is married to John Adams.
biography.name: Tamara Fowler

biography.bio: Bryce Chamberlain is an actor, known for Man's Search for Happiness (1964), Of Heaven and Home (1963) and Son of the Morning Star (1991).
biography.name: Bryce Chamberlain

biography.bio: Mearle Marsh is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Mearle Marsh

biography.bio: Bruce Ackerman is an actor, known for Friends for Life (2008), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Bruce Ackerman

biography.bio: Lonnie Eschler is an actor, known for The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: Lonnie Eschler

biography.bio: Daniel A. Keeler is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and The Joseph Smith Story (1988).
biography.name: Daniel A. Keeler
